Package com.Components

Class Button

java.lang.Object
com.File.Serialize
com.Game.Component
com.Components.Button
Direct Known Subclasses:
CloseWindowButton, RotateButton, SaveLevelButton, SceneChangerButton, SubmitButton
public abstract class Button extends Component
Abstract class of a button. Base class for the implemented buttons.
